entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
